name: Retro Pong (Platoneom)
description:
I included the .exe file and the .cpp source code file. Feel free to download which ever you would like. Like I said, this project was just for me to get used to using Raylib.

CONTROLS:

Left Paddle is controlled with 'W' and 'S' and the Right Paddle is controlled with the up and down arrow keys.

NOTE:

You can press F2 in game to show the live FPS in-game.
